verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. I will lift up <S%H5375><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> unto the mountains <S%H2022><s%>: From whence <S%H370><s%> shall my help <S%H5828><s%> come <S%H935><s%>?
My help <S%H5828><s%> cometh from Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Who made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%>.
He will not suffer <S%H5414><s%> thy foot <S%H7272><s%> to be moved <S%H4132><s%>: He that keepeth <S%H8104><s%> thee will not slumber <S%H5123><s%>.
Behold <S%H8104><s%>, he that keepeth Israel <S%H3478><s%> Will neither slumber <S%H5123><s%> nor sleep <S%H3462><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is thy keeper <S%H8104><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is thy shade <S%H6738><s%> upon thy right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>.
The sun <S%H8121><s%> shall not smite <S%H5221><s%> thee by day <S%H3119><s%>, Nor the moon <S%H3394><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will keep <S%H8104><s%> thee from all evil <S%H7451><s%>; He will keep <S%H8104><s%> thy soul <S%H5315><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will keep <S%H8104><s%> thy going out <S%H3318><s%> and thy coming in <S%H935><s%> From this time forth and for <S%H5704><s%> evermore <S%H5769><s%>.
